snippet: The author, most recently, of the novel “In One Person” has little desire to meet other writers. “It’s better to read a good writer than meet one,” he says.
abstract: By the Book interview with author John Irving, whose most recent novel is In One Person; Irving says he has little desire to meet other writers, insisting it is better to read their work instead.
lead_paragraph: The author, most recently, of the novel “In One Person” has little desire to meet other writers. “It’s better to read a good writer than meet one,” he says.
